name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.cache.revocation.polling.ms
description:
How often the DataNode should poll to see if the clients have
    stopped using a replica that the DataNode wants to uncache.

name: dfs.http.client.failover.max.attempts
description:
Specify the max number of failover attempts for WebHDFS client
    in case of network exception.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.suspectnode.threads
description: The maximum number of threads to use for probing suspect node.

name: dfs.datanode.socket.write.timeout
description: Timeout in ms for clients socket writes to DataNodes.

name: file.bytes-per-checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  file.stream-buffer-size
